snippet: President Obama continued on the campaign trail in Nevada on Wednesday, telling a boisterous crowd that "no act of violence will shake the resolve of the United States of America."
abstract: President Obama continued on the campaign trail in Nevada on Wednesday, telling a boisterous crowd that "no act of violence will shake the resolve of the United States of America."

headline.main: Obama Speaks of Libya Attack at Rally in Las Vegas
headline.print_headline: Obama Keeps Nevada Date, But Crisis Alters the Tone
